productName: Smartwatch for Men Women, Alexa Built-in, 1.8" Fitness Tracker, IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch for Android & iPhone with Bluetooth Call (Answer/Make), Heart Rate/SpO2/Sleep Monitor/Pedometer, Black

reviews.name: Amy Baker
reviews.review-body: This watch is just as good as those big name brands. It has Alexa, takes and makes calls, keeps track of your heart rate, your steps, blood oxygen, detects stress, etcâ€¦ I love it for its health tracking and that you can make calls is an added bonus. Thereâ€™s no way I would pay top dollar for a name brand when this watch does the exact same thing. Andâ€¦ there are so many face plates to choose from.

reviews.name: Vincents
reviews.review-body: The smartwatch is excellentâ€”it even includes some games to help pass the time. I really like the watch face and the variety of built-in tools such as the alarm, Oâ‚‚ analysis, odometer, heart rate monitor, and more. The vendor is also very responsive. I highly recommend both the product and the seller.

reviews.name: Joe Bracewell
reviews.review-body: Have had the watches for several weeks. I chose them as replacement to my old wearing out Waze watches as they seemed to have more features we were interested in. To date they have preformed well, there are a few minor items that I do not think are as good as the old Waze or could be improved on. 1.0 In general they do hold a charge for a week. 3.0 While messages show up on screen they do not stay on long enough to see and I cannot find a way to scan or see them without going back to iPhone. 4.0 May be something I am doing but the watches do not seem to sync time changes with app unless you open the app on the phone, this created some confusiion on a cruise as to what time it really was. 5.0 Would be nice to have selection of alarm sounds other than the strange sound that comes out of the watch and a volume controls for the alarm (one you can test with set).

reviews.name: Sunny Rush
reviews.review-body: I bought this for my daughter, as she was having health issues. This helped her record her various stats for her physician. it is easy to link up to the app on her phone and provides a history of her measurements of heartbeat, oxygen levels, sleep patterns and exercise. it looks like an apple watch, so it is attractive at a fraction of the cost.

reviews.name: Praise
reviews.review-body:
The fitness watch is versatile and enhance your daily life. You can call directly and use Alexa voice control. Itâ€™s also waterproof, you can use it for variety of activities, like you track your fitness goals and exercise record. Itâ€™s touch screen and user-friendly design.
Overall, this smartwatch is a great choice for those looking to stay connected, fit, and informed. I would buy this for a friend.

reviews.name: Joel quino
reviews.review-body: I really look like a good watch and inexpensive, the load lasts 10 days, I really like it for watch lovers and we like to change clocks every year, I recommend you because it is very nice and see how long it lasts.

reviews.name: Denise Auer
reviews.review-body:
I love my new smartwatch. I was recently diagnosed with diabetes. It help me monitor my health issues. The functionally is easy. The fit is very comfortable and light weight. The screen is bright and easy to read, and easy to set up.
Iâ€™m a happy customer!ðŸ¤©

reviews.name: Joshua
reviews.review-body: Great watch especially for the price. It was easy to initially setup and easy to navigate. Especially happy about the quality and fit. Definitely recommend this watch.

reviews.name: Amber Jascob
reviews.review-body: I was gifted this watch as a bonus reward for joining customer care club on Facebook for a watch I had bought myself! I gave it as a gift to my son and he absolutely loves it every time he figures out something new about it like a new feature or a new watch face he's so excited to show it to me. He's 14 and it's definitely a watch for an adult or young teens definitely not for younger kids. So far so good we've had it for about 2 weeks now.

reviews.name: Raymond F. Klocek
reviews.review-body: I Wanted a watch that was modern but, sill just basic. This watch meets most of my wants. It cannot be used without needing a smart phone to download an app. It does work with an IPhone once it activated the basic timing functions will work without your phone being in Bluetooth range. It has many sport and fitness functions and can be used to answer calls and to control music and talk to alexia. The app that you download loads of or maybe the watch itself has a better than average manual that I have found to be quite useful.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.review-body: This is a great watch for the price. Holds up to shower, sauna and hot tub. Display provides time, day, temp, steps, kcals and battery status. The app that links to your phone provides even more information. If I slept, it would track that too.

reviews.name: Yvonne Easter
reviews.review-body: This watch has been great for the price. I have had it for a few weeks now and it has performed well. I even took it swimming and there have been to issues with it. The battery life is long and it doesn't take a ton of time for it to charge either. I'm very happy with this purchase

reviews.name: CRISTAL
reviews.review-body: This is the second watch that I have purchased and I couldn't be happier it does everything that I needed it to do plus some I also love that I can connect my watch to my daughter's watch and we can compare stats. I love how sweet looking it is the battery life is extra long and the accuracy of the heart rate monitoring is amazing 100% recommend

reviews.name: David Edmondson
reviews.review-body: This watch is wonderful! I use it to keep up with my steps more accurately and it helps you set goals for lots of different things like steps, calories burned, and sleep. Also I work from home and an not allowed to have my phone in my workspace so when a call or message comes thru its nice to be able to see if I need to step away for something important or if I can go on about my work. I love that there are so many ways to make it your own with bands and the watch faces. The only thing 2 things I wish this watch would do is 1) I wish I could text back on it and 2) I wish u didn't have to go manually sync the app every couple of days. That's all.... Other than that I love my watch!

reviews.name: Yvonne Tebeau
reviews.review-body: Iâ€™ve had my watch a month. It works great. Awesome battery life. I like the alarm. It helps me wake up. Only issue is the band, it is irritating my skin. But that is no big deal, I will buy a new band.

reviews.name: Love Krystal
reviews.review-body: This is my second purchase of this watch family. The first picture is this watch the second picture is a different watch from the same product offerings from this company and they are both great. They do have limits like not being able to send text messages and a bit of connectivity issues (just a handful of times but you can quickly reconnect through the app). But, nothing that would hinder me from not buying another one. As you can see itâ€™s my second one!!!

reviews.name: Crystal Culmone
reviews.review-body: I love this watch I have it on every single day works well help me with things I need help with like drinking water I got another one to give as a gift and I would recommended this watch.

reviews.name: Gary W. Feveryear
reviews.review-body: Day 7 with my new watch and I could not be happier. With numerous features and the ability to personalize your settings and display, why spend so much for one of those other "name brand" watches? The watch stays connected to my phone throughout the entire house. After a full week, the battery is still at 47%. Good quality, and great value.

reviews.name: Shannon D.
reviews.review-body:
Great Watch for the price! Easily connects with my phone. Love that I can see my notifications and receive phone calls right on my watch. The battery lasts at least two days.
It tracks my heart rate and steps correctly.
The watch face is big and you can see it clearly. You can't go wrong with this watch!

reviews.name: Rachel James
reviews.review-body: This watch is amazing. It comes with a wide variety of abilities. I use it mostly to see how my sleep is, or my stress levels. (Due to migraines). Worth every penny.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.review-body: This watch has surprised me. It has a stress monitor and also tracks your sleep. I am very happy with this purchase based on the features and it was not badly priced. I recommend this watch to anyone looking for an affordable smartwatch!

reviews.name: JW Bach
reviews.review-body: I needed a smartwatch to use while working out and this does everything I needed it to do. It is fairly easy to set up and seems to be just as good as the really expensive ones. However, I donâ€™t wear it all the time and only use it for sports activities.

reviews.name: Dave
reviews.review-body: Really great for the money. No, it's not an Apple Watch, but costs hundreds less. For what I need, It'll be fine.

reviews.name: Danielle Bonetti
reviews.review-body: Very good!

reviews.name: Jessica Sherwood
reviews.review-body: I just got it yesterday, and so far i love it, I got it to track my heart rate bc I have POTS so need to keep an eye on my heart rate.

reviews.name: Greg Flash
reviews.review-body: Very good feel/fit on wrist, light weight, a wide assortment of watch displays to choose from. By the second day, I feel it was giving fairly accurate readings for all data. I was a little disappointed, the US standard date display of MM/DD/YYYY wasnâ€™t available, but thatâ€™s a very minor issue. Very good value for all that it provides.

reviews.name: Brandy
reviews.review-body: Simple connection and straight forward. Had it for 3 days so far and no issues. I've never had a smart watch and I'm enjoying it very much.

reviews.name: Shelly
reviews.review-body: It's not too bad it says I make steps when I don't so far the battery life is pretty good

reviews.name: cynthia
reviews.review-body:
Outstanding -doe's everything I need for it to do
Calls come in on the watch, text messages
Health tracking
And much more
It took a few days to learn the scroll screen but very easy to use.
Nott having to keep my phone in my pocket has been great

reviews.name: A & M
reviews.review-body: A great watch! Highly recommend. It is sturdy, very comfortable, loud and clear speaker quality, great screen quality and the battery lasts over a week. All around the best watch I have had.

reviews.name: Brittany Briggs
reviews.review-body: I have had this watch for a week now I do like it I am able to keep track of my steps and calories I burn which is nice

reviews.name: heather Bustos
reviews.review-body: Iâ€™ve had this watch for a little while and absolutely love it! The features are great the only thing it doesnâ€™t do is text back but other than that a great watch worth your money!

reviews.name: Markus
reviews.review-body: Good

reviews.name: Italiaflgirl76
reviews.review-body: Itâ€™s a great quality watch! The perfect face size & itâ€™s nice and light! Stays charged for about a week. Easy to use!

reviews.name: Aleah Hayes
reviews.review-body: Absolutely love! Easy to use app, great size and fit. A variety of color band options.

reviews.name: michelle speiser
reviews.review-body: I love this watch. It arrived early and was well packaged. Easy to set up

reviews.name: Josh A.
reviews.review-body: love this watch. my 1st smartwatch so no comparisons but tracks steps well. sleek. stylish. comfortable. pairs well via bluetooth. can place calls etc.

reviews.name: B. Shaw
reviews.review-body: Great product for the price. Battery is long lasting and itâ€™s great for pausing music while running or reading texts discretely.

reviews.name: wadkinsjames
reviews.review-body: This watch is excellent. It has all the things I was looking for without the cost. It counts my steps notifies me of messages or emails, calls. It even helps my sleep and the battery life is excellent as well.

reviews.name: Krystin Grimes
reviews.review-body: Watch seems to work well. Battery life is really good. The faceplate I think is a little big for my wrist but that is a me thing not the watch. I like the different options and settings on it. I only wish I could text back on it.

reviews.name: Pam Edens
reviews.review-body: Easy to pair with phone. You can keep track of everything. Built in Alexa is a nice feature. I would add an extra long band for those that have thicker wrists.

reviews.name: sheldon kahhan
reviews.review-body: Cannot get sleep mode to work.went out to the company and we could not get it to work.they gave me a refund and they are a good company to do buisness with

reviews.name: Mary Wallin
reviews.review-body: You canâ€™t lock the screen or if you can I havenâ€™t figured it out yet. You canâ€™t set your workout order. You have to scroll to get to one and scroll some more to find the other but other than that itâ€™s fine. It tracks better than my last one and I like that you can make calls on it and set your screen to a photo of anything on your phone.

reviews.name: Malcolm Johnston
reviews.review-body: The watch works as expected.

reviews.name: Lincoln
reviews.review-body: very nice watch

reviews.name: Christy Davis
reviews.review-body: Awesome watch for a reasonable price. The battery life lasts a long time as well.

reviews.name: Ellen Schroder
reviews.review-body: I have been using this watch for about 10 days.I really like it. It measures more stuff than my previous watch and the cost is great.

reviews.name: Caitlin Ogburn
reviews.review-body: I love the watch, seems much more accurate with my step counting, additionally it has more features then I previously had! I am a huge fan of this watch!

reviews.name: Waynerd the 3rd
reviews.review-body: Had to get myself one after my gf wouldnt stop raving aboit hers! It does everything! From trackkn

reviews.name: KEVIN L FREDERICK
reviews.review-body: Great product, does everything I need it to do well. Easy to use and the app is intuitive.

reviews.name: NicolÃ¡s
reviews.review-body: Nada que envidiarle a los Appleâ€¦ funciona impecable con mi iPhone 16 pro Max y con el iPhone 13 Pro excelente lo recomiendo

reviews.name: M Wright
reviews.review-body: I've had this watch for a week. I'm still learning how to work some of the functions, but so far, it's a lot of fun and very useful. First charge on the battery lasted five days. It does beep and say it has list connectivity with my phone a few times each day. But it reconnects right away.

reviews.name: Ted N.
reviews.review-body: This is a very good watch. It's very affordable and pretty easy to navigate through. I'm still learning about it more and more as I move ahead as I've only had it for a few days, but so far it's been an excellent watch and a very quality product!

reviews.name: Robert Stine
reviews.review-body: I bought it for my wife and she loves it!!

reviews.name: Valerie Sammet
reviews.review-body: Great watch for a great price! I use it for counting my steps and itâ€™s fun to see my heart rate and stress levels. I can even take calls from this phone. I love it. No issues whatsoever.

reviews.name: G. Shock
reviews.review-body: I just got my watch. It was so easy to set up and to learn how to use it. It was also simple to change the watch band. So far I love it.

reviews.name: Georgina
reviews.review-body: Great watch, does what it says. Good price!

reviews.name: Dominick Edwards
reviews.review-body: I revoked my deleted previous review because after spending enough time learning about the watch I have a positive review. It works quite well after you figure out how to figure out how it works. It is more versatile and provides valuable feedback. Calls, emails, music are easy to access as are health info. The main option that helped me use the watch fully was the "help" features integrated into the watch. I've had the Android and IPhone watches. Neither provided the functionality and value this smartwatch provides.

reviews.name: Carmen Muniz
reviews.review-body:
Works perfect
Does almost everything an Apple Watch does

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.review-body: I love this Versa 9. It is larger than the 2 but the graphics, charts and options are amazing

reviews.name: Pearlie Mitchell
reviews.review-body: This is just what I ordered and it does everything that it says that it should do very satisfied

reviews.name: mallorybem
reviews.review-body: I purchased my watch about 3 months ago & I only take it off to charge it. I love it!!! Reasonably priced and does all the things I need it to do! Highly recommend & I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.name: Jean Ryan
reviews.review-body: So far so good, I ordered this smart watch to track my daily steps and to improve my movement since I have a sedentary job. Ease of setup, easy to use- love the sleep tracking as well. Definitely worth the price, very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.name: Ana (from Philly)
reviews.review-body: Great watch! I love that it syncs with Google Fit! Was looking for at a similar watch, the FitBit Versa, but this was priced way lower. I've worn it for 24 hours already and it's worked great! The only negative is that it's really big on me, I have a very small wrist. Otherwise, great watch.

reviews.name: Connie Kelley
reviews.review-body: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas, she loves it! It is affordable and easy to program. She wears it everyday and 3 months later it is still working perfectly. The real test will prove out if it's still working in a year.

reviews.name: Larry Cissick
reviews.review-body: Was going to purchase an Apple Watch and seen this one on Amazon. This watch does everything I want it to do and more.

reviews.name: Charles Adams
reviews.review-body: Working great. I really liked my Fitbit but, thought I'd give this one a try. Working good so far.

reviews.name: AC
reviews.review-body: Love the watch, great value.

reviews.name: Inatimi Dambo
reviews.review-body: I LOVE THIS SMART WATCHâ€¦. ITS THE BEST GIFT TO MY SELF

reviews.name: Kris
reviews.review-body: Love this watch! I bought the white one, it is really cute. I love all the watch face options you can choose from. Has a lot of great features. Worth the money for sure! Easy set up with app, easy to use!

reviews.name: Darlene
reviews.review-body: fast delivery. good product

reviews.name: Donna
reviews.review-body: good fit

reviews.name: Christie Donnelly
reviews.review-body: Amazing value smart watch. It has an app that. tracks your steps, sleep, calorie consumption, and much more. The app is very user friendly and easy to read. Great way to track your health. It will Bluetooth to your phone for texts and calls as well.

reviews.name: gmc505
reviews.review-body:
I hesitated with a 5.... I thought it had blood pressure but the watch is surprisingly comfortable to wear with great features.

Connectivity is a bit quirky...because when you charge the watch you will need to pair again with the phone app.

reviews.name: Gary L Campbell
reviews.review-body: Great so far

reviews.name: Shantal Erving
reviews.review-body: Just as the pic...perfect for the cost.

reviews.name: Myra Blankenship
reviews.review-body: No problems with the delivery watch was delivered in good condition!

reviews.name: Eugene
reviews.review-body: I got at Christmas and been wearing since. I like it..

reviews.name: afolashade
reviews.review-body: This is a good buyâ€¦I recommend this smart watch, it has good features and I like the fact that I can pick my calls, clear and loud speaker.

reviews.name: marsha w.
reviews.review-body: Works wonderfully. My first smart watch and I think it was a great choice .

reviews.name: LEIF MUNDY
reviews.review-body: Notifications would not go from phone to watch. Gave it to my son, who loves it.

reviews.name: CBNW
reviews.review-body: Fantastic timepiece & excellent value.

reviews.name: trish vanarsdalen
reviews.review-body: Itâ€™s OK for health items but for phone items not that great when you get a message it pops on the screen and has gone within two seconds so you really canâ€™t see it not happy about that but was gonna return it but the fact I have to print off a Return label have a box and everything was absolutely a pain

reviews.name: Audiey
reviews.review-body: Love it so much!!!

reviews.name: Ashley Gagyi
reviews.review-body:
Great watch bought for my husband he likes it
Shows text , pulse, step counter , calories burned
Calls and alarm clock
Stays charged for days
Very impressed

reviews.name: nathan kleinschmidt
reviews.review-body: This was a lot cheaper than my fibit versa 4 that I had and I'm happier with this smart watch. It was cheaper, actually stayed connected to my phone (this was my biggest issue with the fitbit) and I love that ot has the find my phone feature as I normally keep my phone on vibrate due to my job. No complaints here!!

reviews.name: lam10
reviews.review-body: Cool watch. Alexa built in so its convenient. Reasonable price and good connectivity. Great seller communication.

reviews.name: Judy Kisamore
reviews.review-body: Love it.

reviews.name: lez
reviews.review-body: Easy to setup. Comfortable to wear. Can change the faces on it. Gave it 3 stars because after a week of wear my bpm stop calculating automatically every day so have to manually check it. Love that it alerts me of calls from my iPhone but it has yet to notify when I get a sms message. Overall Iâ€™m satisfied.

reviews.name: Debbie
reviews.review-body: This watch was recommended to me by a friend. I am so happy he did. I am in love with it, especially the sleep tracking.

reviews.name: Bonnie
reviews.review-body: Love this watch. Love that it reminds me to drink water, tells me my heart rate, steps, etc. The only glitch seems to be the Find Phone function. If I turn it off then back on it works great but the next time I tested it, again no sound. Minor issue for me but it might make a difference for someone else. Oh, also love the sleep function to track not just hours of sleep but deep sleep, rem, and light sleep. Great product for a great price!

reviews.name: Digrajsinh Zala
reviews.review-body: Pretty good watch for pretty good price, has all the features and best battery life. Looks good on wrist.

reviews.name: Linda Larrymore
reviews.review-body:
I received it an hour ago and I like it very much. It paired fast with my Galaxy 23 phone and was easy to set up..
The price is ridicoulously low for a watch with all the features other name brands have.
The wrist band is too bulky for me and I already ordered a metal band with it.
A nice customer mentioned the 22mm size for the replacement band at a review, thank you very much!

reviews.name: WI
reviews.review-body: For the price it is a good smartwatch. Includes an app.

reviews.name: Nancy Lord
reviews.review-body: This watch is so comfortable I hardly know I'm wearing it. Great value. Nice big readable display.

reviews.name: Adrian Jack
reviews.review-body:
The media could not be loaded.
Bought this watch to help monitor my fitness and heart rate. It also comes with many other features . My favorite is that it pairs with Alexa . The band is very soft and causes no irritation to my wrist. It's a light weight sleek design. Pairs easily with your phone. Most everyone will find it easy to use. The price is perfect for all that this watch offers. I LOVE MY NEW WATCH !

reviews.name: luis simental
reviews.review-body:
Great product
Would recommend

reviews.name: starcroc
reviews.review-body: Watch tracked heart rate, stress, sleep & more ok. Disappointed when Alexa didn't work because the watch kept losing connection with the app. Watch was next to phone & blue tooth on. In the end, I took a hammer in frustration and ended this frustrating watch.

reviews.name: Tyler O'Connor
reviews.review-body: I purchased this watch during the black Friday deals. Great price for all the features! a few days in it glitched and I restarted it. So far it's working as I expected.

reviews.name: Jose L.
reviews.review-body: Excellent device. Meets expectations as offered by the seller's description. Very good quality, arrived in perfect condition.
